issue.message: `commons-logging` defines classes that conflict with classes now provided by Android. Solutions include finding newer versions or alternative libraries that don't have the same problem (for example, for `httpclient` use `HttpUrlConnection` or `okhttp` instead), or repackaging the library using something like `jarjar`.

`httpclient` defines classes that conflict with classes now provided by Android. Solutions include finding newer versions or alternative libraries that don't have the same problem (for example, for `httpclient` use `HttpUrlConnection` or `okhttp` instead), or repackaging the library using something like `jarjar`.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

Implementing a custom `X509TrustManager` is error-prone and likely to be insecure. It is likely to disable certificate validation altogether, and is non-trivial to implement correctly without calling Android's default implementation.

Suspicious file name `ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png`: The implied 24 `dp` size does not match the actual `dp` size (pixel size 1280Ã—1280 in a `drawable-hdpi` folder computes to 853Ã—853 `dp`)
Suspicious file name `ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png`: The implied 24 `dp` size does not match the actual `dp` size (pixel size 1280Ã—1280 in a `drawable-mdpi` folder computes to 1280Ã—1280 `dp`)
Suspicious file name `ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png`: The implied 24 `dp` size does not match the actual `dp` size (pixel size 1280Ã—1280 in a `drawable-xhdpi` folder computes to 640Ã—640 `dp`)
Suspicious file name `ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png`: The implied 24 `dp` size does not match the actual `dp` size (pixel size 1280Ã—1280 in a `drawable-xxhdpi` folder computes to 427Ã—427 `dp`)
Suspicious file name `ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png`: The implied 24 `dp` size does not match the actual `dp` size (pixel size 1280Ã—1280 in a `drawable-xxxhdpi` folder computes to 320Ã—320 `dp`)

The image `ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi\ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png: 853x853 dp (1280x1280 px), drawable-mdpi\ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png: 1280x1280 dp (1280x1280 px), drawable-xhdpi\ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png: 640x640 dp (1280x1280 px), drawable-xxhdpi\ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png: 427x427 dp (1280x1280 px), drawable-xxxhdpi\ic_rate_review_black_24dp.png: 320x320 dp (1280x1280 px)
